5cb53471-2472-447c-9e61-9b18cc9abbbd.description: Select specific certificate issuers (e.g., Let's Encrypt, HashiCorp Vault) to filter metrics.
5cb53471-2472-447c-9e61-9b18cc9abbbd.name: issuer

d0f52d72-2e31-4043-a744-7986dc63bad2.description: For multi-cluster setups, filter metrics based on the Kubernetes cluster.
d0f52d72-2e31-4043-a744-7986dc63bad2.name: cluster

d3938ce3-5876-4de2-8058-1341b8f89fcd.name: deployment.environment

d7278dd7-47bc-4c67-a2fb-6d519587456e.description: Filter metrics based on specific certificate names.
d7278dd7-47bc-4c67-a2fb-6d519587456e.name: certificate name

f718848c-9120-4299-b65c-e068d2d4289d.description: Filter metrics based on the Kubernetes namespace where cert-manager is deployed.
f718848c-9120-4299-b65c-e068d2d4289d.name: namespace
f718848c-9120-4299-b65c-e068d2d4289d.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT env
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_samples_v4
WHERE metric_name = 'certmanager_certificate_expiration_timestamp_seconds'

widgets.description: Displays the total number of certificates successfully issued by cert-manager
widgets.title: Total Certificates Issued

widgets.description: Shows the current number of active certificates managed by cert-manager
widgets.title: Active Certificates

widgets.description: Shows the current number of active certificates managed by cert-manager.
widgets.title: Active Certificates

widgets.description: Illustrates the number of certificate requests processed,  including pending and completed requests
widgets.title: Certificate Requests (ACME Client Only)

widgets.description: Displays the total uptime of the cert-manager since the last restart.
widgets.title: Uptime

widgets.description: Shows the number of certificates issued by each configured issuer
widgets.title: Certificates Issued per Issuer

widgets.description: Displays the rate at which certificates are being issued over time, measured requests per second.
widgets.title: Issuance Rate

widgets.description: Illustrates the percentage of successful certificate issuances versus failed attempts
widgets.title: Issuance Success Rate

widgets.description: Shows the number of certificates that are approaching their expiration date and are pending renewal
widgets.title: Certificates Pending Renewal

widgets.description: Displays the number of errors encountered during the certificate issuance process.
widgets.title: Certificate Issuance Errors

widgets.description: Displays the CPU usage by the cert-manager pods, indicating the processing load
widgets.title: CPU Usage

widgets.description: Shows the memory consumption of the cert-manager, helping identify potential memory leaks or inefficiencies.
widgets.title: Memory Usage

widgets.description: Monitors the number of times cert-manager pods have restarted, which could indicate stability issues
widgets.title: Pod Restarts

widgets.description: Monitors errors related to communication with the Kubernetes API server, affecting cert-manager's functionality.
widgets.title: API Server Errors

widgets.description: Displays the rate of API requests processed by cert-manager over time
widgets.title: API Request Rate

widgets.description: Shows the number of Kubernetes events processed by cert-manager, indicating its responsiveness to cluster changes.
widgets.title: Event Processing Rate

widgets.description: Monitors the number of failed API requests, aiding in identifying communication issues with the Kubernetes API server.
widgets.title: Failed API Requests

widgets.description: Shows the number of errors that occurred during the certificate renewal process.
widgets.title: Renewal Errors

widgets.description: Displays the percentage of successful renewals versus failed renewal attempts.
widgets.title: Renewal Success Rate
